abstract: China and India will consume 31 percent of the world’s energy by 2035, up from 21 percent in 2008, the Department of Energy predicted.
snippet: China and India will consume 31 percent of the world’s energy by 2035, up from 21 percent in 2008, the Department of Energy predicted.
lead_paragraph: Global energy demand will increase 53 percent from 2008 through 2035, with China and India accounting for half of the growth, the United States Department of Energy said on Monday.

headline.main: Led by Demand in China, Energy Use Is Projected to Rise 53% by 2035
headline.print_headline: Led by Demand in China, Energy Use Is Projected to Rise 53% by 2035
